mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inscription( id, serial_id, account_id, wx_latitude, wx_longitude, type, content, resource, createTime, score, favor, praise, despise, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{serialId}, #{accountId}, #{wxLatitude}, #{wxLongitude}, #{type}, #{content}, #{resource}, #{createTime}, #{score}, #{favor}, #{praise}, #{despise}, #{status} )
mapper.delete: DELETE * FROM inscription WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update:
UPDATE inscription
score = #{score},
favor = #{favor},
praise = #{praise},
despise = #{despise},
score = #{score},
status = #{status},
WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM inscription WHERE account_id = #{accountId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
